backend/main.mo: Implements the backend actor for managing control layouts, validating 4-bit binary codes, logging events, and generating gpioset command sequences.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration that returns old actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence metadata mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference or tooling.
frontend/docs/linux-local-test-bundle.md: Documentation describing how to run the Linux test bundle, including prerequisites, extraction, and usage steps.
frontend/docs/rpi-bash-runner.md: Explains how the Raspberry Pi event runner script works and how to set it up to execute GPIO events.
frontend/docs/rpi-bash-runner.md.backup: Empty backup file with no content.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling and theme variables plus custom control panel and fullscreen CSS rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the frontend app and main script.
frontend/scripts/linux_bundle_run.sh: Launcher script that checks dependencies, manages dfx replica lifecycle, and starts the local test bundle.
frontend/scripts/package_linux_bundle.sh: Builds frontend and backend, collects artifacts, and packages them into a timestamped Linux bundle tar.gz.
frontend/scripts/rpi_event_runner.sh: Polls a backend canister for events and executes whitelisted GPIO commands on a Raspberry Pi, with optional dry‑run mode.
frontend/scripts/rpi_pin_test.sh: Provides interactive or automated GPIO pin testing for Raspberry Pi using gpioset, supporting dry‑run mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps the control panel screen in a dark‑theme provider and includes toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Ad: Modal UI for creating new controls with type‑specific settings, validation, and binary code generation.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Co: Provides layout state, loads/saves layout via backend actor, validates binary codes, and manages local control creation.
Renders different control types and emits validated signal events, handling UI interactions like press, toggle, slider, and radio changes.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Cr: Provides a button to open the add‑control modal, disabling itself and showing tooltips based on layout and mode state.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Dr: Wraps a control with draggable positioning logic during edit mode and updates layout coordinates on mouse movement.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Fu: Toggles fullscreen mode with error handling and displays appropriate icons and labels.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Im: Handles exporting the current layout to JSON and importing layouts with validation and error reporting.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/In: Displays and edits properties of the selected control, including IDs, binary codes, types, and radio options.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Mo: Switches between edit and interact modes with a single button and icon change.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Re: Shows a scrollable list of recently emitted signals with timestamps and allows manual refresh.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Sh: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Us: Provides a scaffold area for users to add custom UI or logic within a styled card.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Wo: Renders all controls within a bounded workspace, enabling selection and dragging in edit mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlLayout.ts: Provides context access for control layout state and modification methods, ensuring usage within its provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullscreen.ts: Manages fullscreen state for a referenced element with cross-browser support and toggle helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity auth lifecycle, exposing identity, login, logout, and status via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanelMode.ts: Maintains a global edit/interact panel mode synced to localStorage using a custom external store.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentSignals.ts: Fetches recent backend events using the actor, polling periodically and enabling manual refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignalEmitter.ts: Emits control interaction events through the actor and invalidates recent event queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, theming variables, fullscreen rules, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/binaryCode.ts: Validates 4‑bit binary codes and deterministically generates one from a string seed.
frontend/src/lib/controlDefaults.ts: Generates default config values for each control type, including layout and type-specific fields.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utility for downloading JSON data by creating a temporary blob link.
frontend/src/lib/gpiosetCommands.ts: Converts 4‑bit binary codes into Raspberry Pi gpioset command strings and sequences.
frontend/src/lib/layoutSerialization.ts: Validates layout configs, checking control fields and binary codes, and provides JSON import/export helpers.
frontend/src/lib/safeBrowser.ts: Provides safe wrappers for browser APIs like localStorage, hostname, and fullscreen checks.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
Defines the main control panel UI layout, including workspace, side panels, mode controls, and fullscreen handling.
frontend/src/types/controlPanel.ts: Declares TypeScript types for control configurations and layout structures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme settings, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and pending requests for the Linux app bundle effort.
